title: Fort Raleigh National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        Exhibits on display in the visitor center National Park Service     The grounds of Fort Raleigh National Historic Site are open from sunrise to sunset all year-round. The visitor center hours change, depending on whether or not The Lost Colony production is underway. Visitor Center Hours  May 26â€“August 20 10:30 am to 6:30 pm Monday through Saturday 9:00 am to 5:00 pm Sundays   After August 20 9:00 am to 5:00 pm (seven days a week)   Closed on Christmas Day
